book.Title: {{o| ...Fin's notes! about jake :3 and stuff... }}
book.page:
things to remeber : - i think he likes sandwiches....
- i found out he also likes unicorns... ♥ ♥ ♥
- he's very elastic, and can strech a lot!!! I wonder how far could he reach ???
I think he might be older than me; at least its a comforting feeling to have an older brother who can take care of me... :)
[The journal goes on about 20 pages of adventures, and drwaings]

Today... I saw jake sitting still on a hill but he was sitting still for ...SO LONG at first i thought it was funny, maybe a little weird but after 8 hours it stoped being funny at all
weeelll long story short: he is GREAT at meditaiting Hes not especially centered or "focused"... but he can meditate for hours, idk how i guess he just got that DOG in him.. hehe

Oh maaann :( :( Today I gave him some of my stuff, just to hold them for a sec bc... it was heavy and I was tired!! but later on, I forgot about it... ...And then I think: he thinks: I just -gave- it to him bc I didn't want those things or something :(
Today I found out he knows how to cook really well !! He makes the BEST sandwiches EVER ...im not that crazy about sandwiches though :P Im really proud of my old bro anyway :)

If someday he's gone, I dont know what I would do without him
...I think I would go find him?
Yeah, I would I'll go find him, wherever he is.

okay i tried drawing in characters, kinda boring honestly. book.Title: {{leafy|On the reverse, tiny letters protrude to form a note:}}
book.page: {{leafy| Attention: If a skill acquisition pop-up repeatedly appears while traveling on the world map, gently place your hand on the gem embedded in the weapon. This will deactivate the notification, preventing further interruptions. Handle with care.}}

book.Title: {{leafy|On the reverse, tiny letters protrude to form a note:}}
book.page: {{leafy| Attention: Monitor sap levels to maintain sharpness Caution: The weight of its blow remains }}
